text:
This is making some sense now: you send employees on gardening leave & you get a grant for a significant proportion of their wages. Then I think the VAT deferral functions as a loan to bridge the period while the gov gets the structures to pay in place…?
https://t.co/AWiI8weW7e https://t.co/K9EHMAlUl8
